title: 7 BASIC POLYMER CLAY HACKS all crafters should know - Tutorial on how to make better diy crafts
description:
Don't forget to subscribe for weekly videos (⊙ヮ⊙)
Here are some basic, but important things every polymer clay artist should know. These hacks will help you make your DIY sessions much more fun. When I first starting making tutorials, I didn't know most of these, but now that I know these tips and tricks, I wanted to share them with you so that we can all become better polymer clay crafters together! Remember to Like and Share! =D

Remember to use #NerdEcrafter on instagram if you make anything geeky. I am not a clay artist by profession, so all my creations are just for fun. Take some sparkles (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

captions: . hey guys this is Jackie you're nerdy. crafter and today I am presenting you. with some awesome polymer clay hacks. that you can use for your crafting let. me know if you like this and if you do. don't forget to leave a like share and a. comment down below on which one is your. favorite for those of you new to my. channel don't forget to subscribe there. are plenty of tutorials to keep you. entertained are you tired of rolling. your clay does it always come out uneven. and does it always stick to your roller. here's a hack that a lot of. professionals use I'll pass the machine. the fun thing about a pasta machine is. that pieces always come out even and you. can adjust the thickness so if you don't. have one make sure you do get one or. maybe even borrow one from Grandma just. make sure if you use it for clay not to. use it for food do your pieces always. get burnt at the bottom don't worry. here's an easy trick just put a couple. of layers of wax paper in the opposite. way does it always get burnt on top put. a piece of foil paper loosely on top. that will prevent it from burning on. both sides and you can bake it for a. little longer so that becomes harder is. your polymer clay too soft and gooey. don't worry about it all you have to do. is flatten that piece out put it in. between two sheets of paper or one sheet. folded take a heavy book and place that. book right on top leave it there for at. least half an hour and you're going to. see some of the oil actually come off. the clay now it's usable is your clay. too hard and crumbly feel free to use. Vaseline or baby oil they kept them soft. you don't really need too much and it. also depends on how soft you want just. massage it into there. watch the magic happen right in front of. your eyes too many dust particles other. colored clay or fingerprints on your. piece don't worry about it. use rubbing alcohol and a q-tip to clean. it up equally you can use nail polish. remover or baby wipes. nail polish remover also works after the. clay is baked so you have plenty of. options don't like paying high prices. for small bottles of glaze make your way. to the hardware store more often than. not you'll find for practically the same. price you can get wood varnish that is. safe for polymer clay and you're getting. a lot more just make sure that it is. water-based as you can see it gives a. wonderfully glossy finish to pieces I. hope you guys enjoyed these hacks I had. a lot of fun putting them together don't. forget to leave a like share and. subscribe if you're new to this channel. if you have suggestions for future geeky. tutorials leave them in the comments. section below until then I will see you. guys next time
